title: Council Decision of 25 March 1996 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 25 March  1996
appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
(96/C   105/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 80/156/EEC of 21 January 1980 setting up an Advisory Committee on  the Training of Midwives  (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 23 October 1995  (2), the Council appointed Mr Michael RANFT an  alternate member of the Committee for the period ending 22 October 1998;
Whereas the German Government has nominated Ms Margaretha OETZEL-KLOECKER to replace Mr Michael  RANFT,
main_body: Ms Margaretha OETZEL-KLOECKER is hereby appointed a member of the  Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Mr Michael RANFT for the remainder of  his term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1996.
For the Council
The President
G. SALVINI
(1) OJ No L 33, 11. 2. 1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ No C 292, 7. 11. 1995, p. 2.
